name: Triwizard Dance off
description:
Triwizard Dance off

Submission for the Extra Credits Game Jam 2018

Description:
Have you ever felt the need to boogie but have no one to boogie with? Have you spent countless nights dreaming of a world where you can dance your cares away but in the presence a magically inclined bearded gentleman with a heart of gold? Then this is the game for you. 

Directions of use - plug in your VR headset, play your latest banger and get ready to be a slave to the rhythm. YOU WILL NEED A VR HEADSET (OCULUS OR VIVE) IN ORDER TO PLAY THIS GAME. You will also need to play your own music. windows only

(just between you and me, we had plans of doing a VR wizard duel but we ran into some complications so you now have a VR dance competition with a guy that defiantly isn't Gandalf. We are aware that the game is just a guy in a hat dancing)

Credits:
Lexi Townsend - Models and textures
Danny Tan - Programming
Nate Challis - Game Design
Miximo - Animations
Crowd Sound - benfree
